summary: This adds base General Stores activators throughout Vlindrel Hall in Markarth, to autosort and safely store all your items and let you access them from any other General-Stores enabled home.  General Stores required!  Get it at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18340
descriptionHtml:
===Version 1.1 uploaded! Moved some activators for better compatibility with Hearthfire, please see the changelog at the end.===

This mod adds General Stores, autosorting storage activators by the amazing Harvey2112, to Vlindrel Hall in Markarth without removing or changing anything else. For those who are not familiar with General Stores, it\'s like cloud storage for your Skyrim items. Let each activator automatically sort and store all your inventory and you can access it from any other General Stores addon, such as my similar mods for Breezehome in Whiterun, Honeyside in Riften, and Proudspire in Solitude at:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25282
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25283
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25236

Best of all, you can never lose your stuff! As long as you leave the GeneralStores.esm activated it holds all your stuff safely regardless of whether you keep this or any other General Stores mod installed. Mix and match all of them to your heart\'s content, or make your own! Tons of mods for different made from scratch or vanilla homes are already available. Since you need it for this mod anyway, you can read all about Harvey2112\'s General Stores at

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18340

Please endorse him while you are there.

The activators added are:

Scrolls shelf - corner of main hall
Books and papers - on top of Scroll shelf
General chest - alcove on left as soon as you enter the front door
Food pot - on left side of first fireplace
Stolen items lockbox - raised stone alcove on left side of the bedroom
Treasures chest - to the right of the bedroom
Armor dummy - across the door from the vanilla armor dummy in the main hall
Weapon rack - near the entrance to the main hall
Smithing chest - in the main hall
Potion shelf - to the right of the door to the alchemy room
Ingredient shelf - to the left of the door to the alchemy room
Soulstone box - on a stone shelf in the enchanting room

The activators are the only things added, nothing is taken away, and they shouldn\'t clip with anything in any state of house upgrade aside from the occasional spider web. 

Changelog
--------------
1.1 --- Moved the alchemy and potion activators to just outside the alchemy room for better Hearthfire compatibility
1.0 --- First release
author: elGrecoLoco
